This one is very Rare! This is the nicest one you will find. Numbers matching(engine, transmission, body and fenders), 1968 Plymouth Road Runner! Photos and documentation of it all. 4 Speed transmission, Dana rear end, Electric Blue Paint with light blue interior, Red line Bias tires, date coded plug wires, date coded exhaust, and correct style battery. Extremely rare, limited production HEMI car. This is one of 449 , 1968 HEMI 4 Speed, 2 Door Coupes produced. Has original keys, and owners manual, This has been inspected by Galen V. Govier. It has been registered in the Galens Registry and is #5 of 63 in this vin sequence, of all 1968 426 HEMI PLYMOUTH Road Runner 2 Door Coupe's , accounted for at the St. Louis, MO plant and built to specs for the USA . This is a very rare Police Interceptor package as well, per the build sheet. It has been graded on the harshest standards around and has been marked as excellent condition. All original parts and fenders. No parts have been replaced on this vehicle. We have the original build sheet. This one was bought at Barrett jackson in Scottsdale, AZ. In 2010 this vehicle appraised for over $180,000, by the International Vehicle Appraisers Network.I have all documentation to show as well. This one is flawless!! Call Adam at 402-253-2976 for more information! Just dropped price 15,000. If you want a steal and this car will only become more rare ,DONT MISS IT!!!!! Need to turn into cash Just dropped 8,000!!! For the serious car collector.

description: Vroom is a national online retailer that allows you to shop thousands of high-quality vehicles online, delivered straight to you contact-free. With Vroom, browse and shop through an extensive inventory of low-mileage, competitively priced cars, and trucks available for purchase, with easy online financing and new inventory added every day. No haggling. No pressure. Buy your next vehicle from Vroom, have it delivered straight to you, and never visit a dealership again.Have a car to trade-in? Vroom offers hassle-free, no obligation quotes and they will even pick it up. Learn more at Vroom.com.Vroom only sells cars and trucks with clean titles, that are free of fire, flood and frame damage and have accident-free CARFAX vehicle history reports at the time of purchase and sale. Every Vroom vehicle must also pass safety, mechanical and cosmetic inspections before it is sold.
